lines.text: by Charles Ballato
Pipefitters Locai 620
Grotan, Conn. 0634o
The Electric Boat Division of General Dynamics is located
in Groton, Connecticut on the Thames River. Electric Boat has
built submarines since the early l9oo's. Over 2o,ooo people have
been building nuclear submarines and overhauling submarines for
the last 25 years.
Until the early l97o's, nuclear submarines were constructed
with large amounts of asbestos insuiation on pipes, equipment
and components. Asbestos insulation was instalied by pipe laggers
or pipecoverers. Other trades also used asbestos including:
Welders
Burners
Braziers
Shipfitters
Leadbonders
Machinists
Pipefitters
Carpenters
Electricians
All trades, however, work in, near or about laggers or
other trades using asbestos. Therefore, almost all trades in
the shipyard have had asbestos exposure.
In l975, the pipe laggers numbered about l0o employees.
Other trades would pass through the areas where laggers were
